price: (35) That they may eat of His fruit.[1266] And their hands have not produced it,[1267] so will they not be grateful?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes:
[1266]- i.e., that which Allāh has produced for them.
[1267]- An alternative meaning is "And [eat from] what their hands have produced [i.e., planted and harvested]."  Both are grammatically correct.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim afalā yashkurūna
